hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah:The Prophet (ﷺ) fasted for days continuously; the people also did the same but it was difficult for them. So, the Prophet (ﷺ) forbade them (to fast continuously for more than one day). They said, "But you fast without break (no food was taken in the evening or in the morning)." The Prophet (ﷺ) replied, "I am not like you, for I am provided with food and drink (by Allah)

chapter.ara-name: باب بَرَكَةِ السَّحُورِ مِنْ غَيْرِ إِيجَابٍ
chapter.eng-name: Sahur is a blessing but it is not compulsory
